name: noOS
description:
A strange application from 2014 I found on a USB stick when packing my stuff. I don't remember working on it or what I had in mind at the time, I can't even figure out how to progress through the first screens, so, for the curious out there, maybe someone will be able to crack it.

The controls, from what I could guess :

Right-clic OR press Space to guide the little character.

Left-clic to interact with things.

ESC to reboot current screen, I think.
